inputRatherSearchByTyping: Za ka iya nema ta hanyar rubata suna?
countryRankBandMessage1To28: Kasarka/ki na daga cikin kasashen da ke kan gaba wajen daidaito tsakanin maza da mata a duniya. Matsayinta ya kai {{countryRank}}
countryRankBandMessage29To57: Bambance-bambancen da ke tsakanin maza da mata ba su da yawa idan aka kwatanta da na sauran kasashe. Matakin hakan ya kai {{countryRank}}
countryRankBandMessage58To86: Bambancin da ke tsakanin maza da mata a kasarka/ki ya kusa dai-dai idan aka kwatanta da na sauran kasashe. Matakin hakan ya kai. {{countryRank}}
countryRankBandMessage87To115: Bambancin da ke tsakanin maza da mata a kasarka/ki na da yawa idan aka kwatanta da na sauran kasashe.Matakin hakan ya kai {{countryRank}}
countryRankBandMessage116To145: Kasarka/ki na daga cikin kasashen da ke baya wajen daidaito tsakanin maza da mata. Matsayinta ya kai {{countryRank}}
risersText: A cikin shekaru 10 da suka gabata kasashen Bolivia da Nicaragua su suka fi yin sama.
fallersText: Tun daga shekarar 2005, Croatia da Sri Lanka na daga cikin manyan kasashen da suka yi kasa.
earningsDescrip: A kan kowacce {{currencySymbol}}{{maleEarningsFigure}} da namiji ya samu a kasa, macen da ke aiki tana samun {{currencySymbol}}{{femaleEarningsFigure}}
earningsFooter: Ko ka san cewa a Amurka, mafi yawan mata kan yi aiki na kusan wata biyu ba tare da ambiya su ba, sabanin maza?
graduatesTextWomen: Adadin matan da su ka kammala karatun jami'a
graduatesTextMen: Adadin mazan da su ka kammala karatun jami'a
employmentDescrip: Adadin mata da mazan da su ke neman aiki ya kai
employmentFooter: Ko kasan cewa a cikin kasashe 145, kasashe 4 ne kadai mata suka fi maza aiki a Afrika? Kasashen su ne Malawi, Mozambique,Rwanda da kuma Burundi.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessage0to10: Manyan jami'ai da 'yan majalisu zaka ga mata.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessage11to15: Kusan kaso daya cikin 10 na manyan jami'ai da manajoji da kuma 'yan majalisu mata ne.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessage16to24: Kusan daya bisa biyar na manyan jami'ai da manajoji da 'yan majalisu kuma maza ne.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessage25to34: Kusan uku cikin goma na Manyan jami'ai da manajoji da kuma 'yan majalisu mata ne.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessage35to44: Kusan biyu cikin biyar na manyan jami'ai da 'yan majalisu da manajoji mata ne.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessage45to50: Kusan rabin manyan jami'ai da manajoji da 'yan majalisu mata ne.
seniorOfficialsWomenMessageAbove50: An fi samun mata a matsayin manyan jami'ai da manajoji da kuma 'yan majalisu.
seniorOfficialsMenMessageAbove95: Kusan manyan jami'ai da manajoji da 'yan majalisu maza ne.
seniorOfficialsMenMessage85to94: Kusan tara cikin goma na manyan jami'ai da manajoji da kuma 'yan majalisu maza ne.
seniorOfficialsMenMessage75to84: Kusan hudu cikin biyar na manyan jami'ai da manajoji da 'yan majalisu maza ne.
seniorOfficialsMenMessage65to74: Kusan bakwai cikin goma manyan jami'ai da manajoji da 'yan majalisu maza ne.
seniorOfficialsMenMessage55to64: Kusan uku cikin biyar na manyan jami'ai da manajoji da kuma 'yan majalisu maza ne.
seniorOffiicialsMenMessage50to54: Kusan rabin manyan jami'ai da manajoji da 'yan majalisu maza ne.
seniorOfficialsMenMessageBelow50: Akwai maza kalilan a kan mata a matsayin manyan jami'ai da manajoji da kuma 'yan majalisu.
seniorOfficialsFooter: A Colombia ne kadai, Fiji da Philippines suka fi mata da ke taka muhimmiyar rawa akan maza.
govMinistersDescripFemale: Rabon mukaman minitoci ya fi ga mata.
govMinistersDescripMale: Rabon mukaman ministoci ya fi ga maza
globalSummaryDescrip: Idan yanayin sauyin da ake samu a yanzu ya ci gaba, to ba za a iya cike tazarar da ake samu  a tattalin arziki tsakanin maza da mata ba.
shareTextGlobalSummary: Ba za a iya cike tazarar da ake samu ta tattalin arziki tsakanin maza da mata ba nan da shekara ta 2133. Ka binciki matsayin da kasarka take.
cantFindCountry: Ba za a iya gano kasarka/ki ba?
emailSubject: Yaya daidaitonka yake? Ya ya kake yada labaran BBC?
shareTextCountryRank: {{myCountry}} matsayinta {{countryRank}}/145 na dai-daiton jinsi.Ya ya kasarka fa?
shareTextEarnings: Ga komai {{currencySymbol}} {{maleEarningsFigure}}{{myCountry}} {{currencySymbol}}{{femaleEarningsFigure}}.Ya abin ya ke fa a kasarka?
shareTextGraduatesWomen: A kasata, daidaito tsakanin matan da suka kammala jami'a ya kai{adadin matan da suka kammala jami'a}.Yaya adadin yake a kasarka?

shareTextEmploymentWomen: A {{myCountry}},{{employmentPercentageWomen}}. Ya abin ya ke a kasarka?
shareTextSeniorOfficialsWomen: A {{myCountry}}, {{seniorOfficialsPercentageWomen}}. Ya abin yake a kasarka?
shareTextSeniorOfficialsMen: A  {{myCountry}}, adadin {{seniorOfficialsPercentageMen}} manyan jami'ai maza da manajoji maza da kuma 'yan majalisu maza ne. Yaya lamarin  yake a kasarka?
